storyInfo:
On the way back to her tribe, Zumama learns that Gavial is looking for her.
A warrior named Kemar goes to stop Gavial, but finds Blaze instead.

attributes.content: High Priest, how is it looking?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: I have to say, that cannon was so astoundingly loud, I almost got blown out of the thing when it fired!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: I'm asking you about the Big, Ugly Thing.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: I was just sharing my personal situation with you. It went exactly as we expected. Firing the cannon in succession caused it to overheat.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: But it went very well. Yes, I have to say, it was very effective! Despite the fact that it gave me quite the scare!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: In any case, we will have to fix it up after we get back.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Yeah, the ceremony happened way too quickly. The Big Ugly wasn't ready yet.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: I was hoping to wait until we finished it before talking to the other tribes about the ceremony, but they'd already gone ahead with it.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: It's okay. It all turned out fine!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: I still remember how shocked everyone was when they first saw the Big, Ugly Thing! Haha, that was so funny!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Yeah, we've accomplished our goal.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: This will set in motion a new order! A new era! Yes, an age of machines! That has such a nice ring to it!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: What do you think of the 'Age of Big Ugly'? Oh, maybe the 'Age of the High Priest' too. Yes, that sounds almost as cool as I do.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Let's just call it the age of machines.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Sheesh, you have a lot going for you, but you're still behind the times. Now that you've learned what it's like outside, you should try to expand your horizons!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Here, check out my outfit. Don't you think it's trendy? Looks smart?
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: You're so short, I can't even see it. What does trendy mean, anyway?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Argh, never mind. My mistake. I shouldn't have brought this up. But no matter. I'll pick out some clothes befitting you, our next Great Chief.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: I don't mind how I dress. Anyway, I just got word from the tribesmen who stayed behind. They managed to steal an engine.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: What? Really?
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Yes, apparently they got it from the transport Gavial used to get here.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Wonderful! I can't wait to take a good look at it!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Oh, come to think of it, I can go check it out right now! I'll see you later!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: The High Priest's the same as ever.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Hey, who was the Liberi talking to the leader?
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: What, you new here? That's the High Priest! You know, the Big Ugly's pilot!
attributes.name: Archosauria B

attributes.content: What? I want to pilot the Big Ugly!
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: Give it up. Before it was finished, that thing used to explode just about every day. So many hands got caught up in the explosions, in the end no one wanted to pilot it.
attributes.name: Archosauria B

attributes.content: Then the High Priest came along, and he somehow managed to come back alive every time it blew up!
attributes.name: Archosauria B

attributes.content: No kidding? He's that good? !
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: Yeah, I've got no idea what tribe he's from, but we all call him the High Priest now!
attributes.name: Archosauria B

attributes.content: Hm? Isn't that Yogi over there? Hey, Yogi.
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: Oh, it's you two.
attributes.name: Yogi

attributes.content: I thought you were taking care of your brother. Where is he?
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: Actually, I'm going to the leader to talk about that.
attributes.name: Yogi

attributes.content: You idiot, she's the Great Chief now!
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: Oh, I'm going to the Great Chief.
attributes.name: Yogi

attributes.content: What's the matter?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Great Chief, my brother has caught the Stone Disease.
attributes.name: Yogi

attributes.content: Speak Sargonian.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Oh, yes, sorry. I'm not very good at speaking it yet.
attributes.name: Yogi

attributes.content: ...How did he catch the disease?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: He wanted to mine more ores and went deeper into the mine. He didn't even listen to me when I told him not to...
attributes.name: Yogi

attributes.content: That idiot! Didn't I tell you to stay away from the mine's depths?!
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Where is he now?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Gavial took him away for treatment.
attributes.name: Yogi

attributes.content: Gavial?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Yes, it looks like Gavial actually became a doctor. My brother was in a lot of pain, but he seemed much better after she patched him up a bit.
attributes.name: Yogi

attributes.content: ...So she really meant it when she said she's a doctor now.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: She wanted me to pass along a message too.
attributes.name: Yogi

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: She said she was coming for you. She looked angry.
attributes.name: Yogi

attributes.content: Hmph, I bet she's just upset our leader defeated her!
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: That's right, leader! What you did back there. That boom! That was amazing!
attributes.name: Archosauria B

attributes.content: You didn't call her Great Chief!
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: You didn't either!
attributes.name: Archosauria B

attributes.content: Get off my back, you moron! She'll always be our tribe leader!
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: Why don't you get off my back? I just haven't gotten used to calling her that yet!
attributes.name: Archosauria B

attributes.content: Gavial isn't like that.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Great Chief, I trust Gavial.
attributes.name: Yogi

attributes.content: Yes, I trust her too. Your brother will be fine. Where is he?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: At Tomimi's tribe.
attributes.name: Yogi

attributes.content: Tomimi's... You should go get your brother later.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Yogi

attributes.content: I'm certain Gavial's here to get her engine back!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: ...She'll have to go through me to get it.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: I'll admit that Gavial's strong, but she thinks her fists are everything.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: She's wrong.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: If she's here for her engine, then I'll give her another taste of the Big Ugly's might.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: ...But I won't give it back to her. This engine is very important to our tribe, no, our future.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Did you just mention Gavial?
Flint, did you hear that?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Why don't you cry in your bed some more about the Great Chief?!
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: And why don't you go home to your mama and have her teach you what to call the Great Chief?!
attributes.name: Archosauria B

attributes.content: Knock it off, you two.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Gah!
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: You... Kemar?
attributes.name: Archosauria B

attributes.content: You don't want her to come, do you?
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: If she comes, I'll defeat her.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: So you don't you want her here. Then I'll stop her.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: I'll be going, then.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Back already?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Err, where is Gavial?
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Tch, this rainforest's way too humid! I've barely hiked half a day and I'm already drenched in sweat! And I haven't seen a soul in the two days I've been here!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Thank goodness I wore my swimsuit underneath. What a lifesaver. I'm really getting my money's worth with it.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Really, though. Even when I climb the trees here, all I see is more trees! Just where's that ceremony Gavial was talking about?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Hey, is anyone here?!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Hey, Gavial, your tail's tiny!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Hey, Doctor, maybe it's time for you to change that hood of yours!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: ...Tsk, they aren't within earshot.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Ugh, if something happens to the Doctor, what am I supposed to tell Amiya?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I guess I shouldn't worry since Gavial said she'd take care of the Doctor, but... I'm not sure that's all that reassuring, knowing her.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Urgh, the more I think about it, the more worried I am. Maybe I should try knocking a few trees down to make some noise.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: ...According to Yogi, I should find Gavial if I go this direction.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Whoa, finally! A person!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Hey there!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I haven't seen clothes like that before. Who are you?
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Huh? What are you saying?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You don't understand me?
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Urgh, is this for real? Gavial didn't tell me people here speak a different language!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: But it looks like you can hold your own in a fight.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Hey, c'mon! This how you people treat visitors?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Just as I thought, you're strong.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Before I take Gavial down, I'll have some fun with you first.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Hm? Did she just say Gavial?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Whatever, I'm in a pretty bad mood right now. If you want to fight, then bring it on!
attributes.name: Blaze
